org.intermine.webservice.server.query

Class QueryUpdateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.webservice.server.WebService
      • org.intermine.webservice.server.query.QueryUploadService
        • org.intermine.webservice.server.query.QueryUpdateService

  • public class QueryUpdateService
extends QueryUploadService
    Same in all respects as the upload service, but this class overwrites queries with the provided names.
